attributes.action: Close Nursery schools in England to non key workers.
attributes.additional_details: Schools are deemed unsafe due to Covid where social distancing is easier to maintain than in a nursery where a hands on approach is required due to age and needs. This is both leaving the children and staff at high risk.
attributes.background: Close Nursery schools and all Early years settings to non key workers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
